Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute at Archer/Lock
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Ashland, Cermak, Halsted to Orange Line terminal due to, street blockage near Archer/Lock.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Archer, Ashland, Cermak, Halsted to Orange Line terminal due to, street blockage near Archer/Lock.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark  Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, and Clark, due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, and Clark, due to street blockage.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Delayed near 47th
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at 47th due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at 47th due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
